title: Contributing to paletteer
text: outlines propose change paletteer. detailed info contributing , tidyverse packages, please see development contributing guide.

title: Contributing to paletteer
text: Small typos grammatical errors documentation may edited directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. YES: edit roxygen comment .R file R/. : edit .Rd file man/.

title: Contributing to paletteer
text: make substantial pull request, always file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s problem. ’ve found bug, create associated issue illustrate bug minimal reprex.

title: Contributing to paletteer
text: recommend create Git branch pull request (PR). Look Travis AppVeyor build status making changes. README contain badges continuous integration services used package. New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat. Contributions test cases included easier accept. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md current development version header describing changes made followed GitHub username, links relevant issue(s)/PR(s).

title: Contributing to paletteer
text: Please note paletteer project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

code: @Manual{,   title = {paletteer: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes},   author = {Emil Hvitfeldt},   year = {2021},   note = {R package version 1.3.0},   url = {https://github.com/EmilHvitfeldt/paletteer}, }

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: goal paletteer comprehensive collection color palettes R using common interface. Think “caret palettes”. Notice version backwards compatible versions <= 0.2.1. Please refer end readme breaking changes

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: can install released version paletteer CRAN : want development version instead install directly GitHub:

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: palettes divided 2 groups; discrete continuous. discrete palette choice fixed width palettes dynamic palettes. common two fixed width palettes set amount colors doesn’t change number colors requested vary like following palettes:  hand dynamic palettes colors palette depend number colors need like green.pal palette cartography package:  Lastly continuous palettes provides many colors need smooth transition color:  package includes 2759 palettes 75 different packages information can found following data.frames: palettes_c_names, palettes_d_names palettes_dynamic_names. Additionally github repo showcases palettes included package .

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: palettes can accessed 3 functions paletteer_c(), paletteer_d() paletteer_dynamic() using using syntax packagename::palettename. functions now also support tab completion easily access hundreds choices

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: Lastly package also includes scales ggplot2 using standard interface
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +   geom_point() +   scale_color_paletteer_d("nord::aurora")

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: version <= 0.2.1 palatte selected specifying package palette argument like version 0.2.1 palettes selected using syntax "packagename::palettename" inside palette functions.

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: Hadley Wickham helpful code improvements.

title: Comprehensive Collection of Color Palettes
text: paletteer includes palettes following packages:

what: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
text: functions provide option use binned palettes along ggplot2 package. goes without saying requires ggplot2 work.

title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
code: scale_colour_paletteer_binned(palette, direction = 1, ...)  scale_color_paletteer_binned(palette, direction = 1, ...)  scale_fill_paletteer_binned(palette, direction = 1, ...)

title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
text: palette Name palette string. Must form packagename::palettename. direction Either 1 -1. -1 palette reversed. ... Arguments pass ggplot2::scale_colour_stepsn() ggplot2::scale_fill_stepsn()

title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
text: ScaleContinuous object can added ggplot object

title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
text: Available package/palette combinations available data.frame palettes_c_names.

title: Binned scales to use for ggplot2 — ggplot2-scales-binned
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, colour = Petal.Length)) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_paletteer_binned("scico::tokyo")

text: palette Name palette string. Must form packagename::palettename. direction Either 1 -1. -1 palette reversed. ... Arguments pass ggplot2::scale_colour_gradientn() ggplot2::scale_fill_gradientn()

code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, colour = Petal.Length)) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_paletteer_c("scico::tokyo")

what: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
title: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
text: functions provide option use discrete dynamic palettes along ggplot2 package. goes without saying requires ggplot2 work.

title: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
code: scale_colour_paletteer_d(palette, direction = 1, dynamic = FALSE, ...)  scale_color_paletteer_d(palette, direction = 1, dynamic = FALSE, ...)  scale_fill_paletteer_d(palette, direction = 1, dynamic = FALSE, ...)

title: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
text: palette Name palette string. Must form packagename::palettename. direction Either 1 -1. -1 palette reversed. dynamic toggles discrete palettes dynamic palettes. Defaults FALSE indicates discrete palettes. ... additional arguments pass discrete_scale

title: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
text: Available package/palette combinations available data.frame palettes_d_names palettes_dynamic_names.

title: Discrete scales to use for ggplot2 — scale_colour_paletteer_d
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, colour = Species)) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_paletteer_d("nord::frost")

title: Get discrete palette by package and name — paletteer_d
Get discrete palette by package and name — paletteer_d
text: palette Name palette string. Must form packagename::palettename. n Number colors desired. omitted, returns complete palette. direction Either 1 -1. -1 palette reversed. type Either "discrete" "continuous". Colors interpolated "continuous" picked. Defaults "discrete".

title: paletteer 1.6.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-01-21 15 palettes added vangogh package. (#133) 30 palettes added ButterflyColors package. (#136) 35 palettes added MoMAColors package. (#142) 32 palettes added PrettyCols package. (#126) 15 palettes added waRhol package. (#131) 18 palettes added MexBrewer package. (#137) 24 palettes added ltc package. (#140)

title: paletteer 1.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-19 Added sky palette khroma package. Added 31 Steven Universe palettes tvthemes package. 11 palettes added feathers package. (#116) 56 palettes added MetBrewer package. (#119) 7 palettes added musculusColors package. (#120) 21 palettes added peRReo package. (#122) 30 palettes added NatParksPalettes package. (#123) 24 palettes added impressionist.colors package. (#125) 7 palettes added severance package. (#127)

title: paletteer 1.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-08-15 Fixed documentation HTML5 friendly.

title: paletteer 1.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-07-20 palettes_c_names palettes_d_names enhanced information. 10 palettes added tayloRswift package. (#111) 12 palettes added popthemes package. (#107) 65 palettes added ggprism package. (#102) 129 palettes added nbapalettes package. (#102)

title: paletteer 1.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-06 14 palettes added soilpaletttes package. (#95) 20 palettes added rockthemes package. (#97) 19 palettes added Manu package. (#98)

title: paletteer 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-06-07 Packages provide continious color paletttes moved Imports Suggests. (#93) 17 palettes added khroma package. (#88) 130 palettes added beyonce package. (#87) 6 palettes added suffrager package. (#86) 19 palettes added colorBlindness package. (#85) 15 palettes added rtist package. (#84) palette names changed remove non-ascii characters.

title: paletteer 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-03-10 added scale_color_paletteer_binned() support binned scales. 20 palettes added futurevisions package. (#82)

title: paletteer 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-12-18 front facing functions now take single palette argument format package::palette instead previous two arguments package palette. palette argument must supplied string. output main functions now colors class prismatic package. 128 palettes added lisa package. (#35) 16 palettes added IslamicArt package. (#36) 9 palettes added basetheme package. (#41) 8 palettes added vapeplot package. (#42) 18 palettes added ggthemr package. (#47) 84 palettes added fishualize package. (#52) 18 palettes added DresdenColor package. (#54) 35 palettes added trekcolors package. (#55) 25 palettes added nationalparkcolors package. (#58) 6 palettes added MapPalettes package. (#62) 18 palettes added werpals package. (#63) 22 palettes added calecopal package. (#64) 2 palettes adden colorblindr package. (#66) 54 palettes added colRoz package. (#69) 16 palettes added unikn package. (#72) 27 palettes added tvthemes package. (#39) 10 palettes added PNWColors package. (#74) 48 palettes added palettesForR package. (#25) 110 palettes added hcl.pals(). (#51)

title: paletteer 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2019-02-13 Fixed bug ggthemes wasn’t loaded properly. (#26)

title: paletteer 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-02-04 Description add palettes moved vignette CONTRIBUTION.md. 15 palettes added harrypotter package. 16 palettes added gameofthrones package. 3 palettes added tidyquant package.

title: paletteer 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-07-10 Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added palettetown palettes. Added vapoRwave palettes.
